Portlet Element Code Source changes
===================================

0.6

  Fixes:

    - The content wrapper should be a <div> and not a <p>.

0.5

  Fixes:

    - Fixed unicode error if one of the parameters is empty.
    - Fix for lookup window (get reference).

0.4

  Fixes:

    - Fixed wrong title for css class and wrong spacing in the description.

0.3

  Features added:

    - Making it possible to set css classes and id's.

0.2

  Features added:

    - Changed the id, added alignment, style, and an optional title, edited 
      field descriptions. 

0.1

    Initial version from Marc Petitmermet.
